Reviews.Title: very good merchandise
Reviews.Author: Joyce Scott
Reviews.Content: The item work perfectly fine. unfortunately it was a gift. this person received two phone.unfortunately we had to return one

Reviews.Title: I love the Blackberry Torch!!
Reviews.Author: kendra stuckey
Reviews.Content: Yes I love the color and the style and it works great and it was in really great shape and it came with everything that was listed to come with the phone!

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: steveen salas
Reviews.Content: Very good the product, excellent quite, a bit slow for the season but I come in perfect condition. I recommend it
